timeline.bodyText:
Do we need this test ?
We try to avoid pure UTs as much as possible.
timeline.author: romani

replies.bodyText: done
replies.author: pbludov

replies.bodyText: now ./.ci/pitest.sh pitest-common-2 fails
replies.author: pbludov

replies.bodyText: We need this test. I think we should keep all test for API. For an utility class a pure UT test is redundant, but this is the part of our API.
replies.author: pbludov

replies.bodyText:
As this test is for technical coverage, we need to add comment over it to explain reason.
It is ok to have to pure UT for API only if do not use it. In other case it is good question why our tests can not cover such mutation
replies.author: romani

replies.bodyText: The whole class DetailAstImplTest is for technical coverage. As many other tests. It's good to add this description to all of them, but it should be a separate issue.
replies.author: pbludov

replies.bodyText: @romani We had a discussion about this when we created DetailASTImpl (I believe). Some random Check covered a line in the AST. It was some completely random test and it didn't make sense how it was proof the AST API method was shown to be working correctly. Thats when we said we would force API to have their own UTs.
replies.author: rnveach

replies.bodyText:
this happens because of very limited test execution scope .... we did this for performance reason.
https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/master/pom.xml#L2722
from pitest report:
return getFirstChild() != null;
1. replaced boolean return with true for com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle
/DetailAstImpl::hasChildren → NO_COVERAGE
2. negated conditional → NO_COVERAGE
3. removed conditional - replaced equality check with false → NO_COVERAGE
4. removed conditional - replaced equality check with true → NO_COVERAGE
5. replaced return of integer sized value with (x == 0 ? 1 : 0) → NO_COVERAGE
replies.author: romani

replies.bodyText:
This test method is using reflection ... it must have comment to explain it (we agreed on this a long time ago). Please also add some sentence that it is required only because to satisfy certain pitest profile .
one day it will change so we will have details on why it is required.
replies.author: romani

replies.bodyText: This test should not use any reflection. Fixed.
